metadata.dc:title: Iris Dataset Converted to HDF5
metadata.dc:creator: JJ Wagner
metadata.dc:subject: Iris dataset; HDF5; data preservation
metadata.dc:description: This describes an HDF5 representation of the Iris dataset containing measurments of iris flowers and their labels. The original tabular data has been converted from its CSV format into an HDF5 file for preservation and access. The HDF5 file stores the feature data and labels in seperate dataset files, along with their original metadata, preserving all the information. No transformations were made beside the format conversion, except for standard typ casting needed for HDF5.
metadata.dc:source: Original Iris dataset by R.A. Fisher
metadata.dc:relation: Notebooks or scripts used for conversion to HDF5
metadata.dc:rights: This repository is licensed with the MIT License.
